name: order-created.toml

event.name: Order Created
event.description: Client submitted a new care order request

payload.name: serviceType
payload.description: Type of care service (caregiver, nurse, household, etc)

backend.description: Creates order record in database, sends notification to admin dashboard, reserves time slot

rawContent:
[event]
id = "order.created"
name = "Order Created"
description = "Client submitted a new care order request"
category = "order"

[trigger]
action = "submit"
element = "Order confirmation button"

[[payload]]
name = "orderId"
type = "string"
description = "Unique order identifier"

[[payload]]
name = "serviceType"
type = "string"
description = "Type of care service (caregiver, nurse, household, etc)"

[[payload]]
name = "city"
type = "string"
description = "City where service is needed"

[[payload]]
name = "date"
type = "string"
description = "Scheduled date for service"

[backend]
description = "Creates order record in database, sends notification to admin dashboard, reserves time slot"

[relations]
entities = ["care-order"]
routes = ["client-order-form"]
